summary: P0 Backlog testing completed successfully. All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified for OCR button, Voice-to-Text buttons, and Admin Settings page with OCR/Voice/Storage provider options.

console_warnings.issue: React hydration warning: <span> cannot be a child of <option>
console_warnings.note: Does not affect functionality, cosmetic issue with option rendering

backend: Admin login with wrong password correctly rejected
/api/ocr/detect-plate endpoint accessible (returns use_browser=true without API key)
/api/ocr/detect-text endpoint accessible (returns use_browser=true without API key)
OCR endpoints require authentication (401 without token)
/api/voice/transcribe endpoint accessible (returns use_browser=true without API key)
Voice transcribe works with different providers (openai, gemini, browser)
Voice endpoint requires authentication (401 without token)
Standard record validation - requires plate and work_order
Standard record creation successful with valid data
frontend: Login page loads and accepts credentials
Home page shows record list after login
New Record page accessible via FAB + button
Record type selection shows all 4 types (Standard, Yol Yardım, Hasarlı, PDI)
Standard form shows OCR 'Tara' button for plate scanning
Standard form shows Browser Voice microphone button (Web Speech API)
Standard form shows Server Voice microphone button (Whisper AI)
Admin page accessible and shows Dashboard
Admin Settings page shows OCR Ayarları section with provider dropdown
Admin Settings page shows Sesli Not (Voice-to-Text) section with provider dropdown
Admin Settings page shows Depolama Ayarları section with storage type dropdown
Admin Settings page shows Kaydet (Save) button

critical_code_review_comments: OCR and Voice services correctly fallback to browser-based alternatives when server API keys are not configured
Frontend hooks (usePlateOCR.js, useSpeechRecognition.js) properly handle server unavailability with graceful degradation
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_p0_backlog.py (new test file for P0 backlog features)
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 Backlog features fully tested. OCR frontend button ('Tara'), Voice-to-Text buttons (browser + server), and Admin Settings for OCR/Voice/Storage providers all working correctly. External services (Google Vision OCR, OpenAI Whisper) return use_browser=true when API keys not configured - this is expected behavior.

mocked_apis.note: The following integrations gracefully fallback to browser alternatives
list: Google Vision OCR - returns use_browser=true, frontend uses Tesseract.js
OpenAI Whisper - returns use_browser=true, frontend uses Web Speech API

ocr_integration.fallback: Browser Tesseract.js when server not configured

voice_to_text_integration.browser_button: Present - Mic icon for Web Speech API
voice_to_text_integration.server_button: Present - Mic icon with yellow accent for Whisper AI
voice_to_text_integration.fallback: Browser Web Speech API when server not configured

admin_settings.ocr_provider: Dropdown with Tarayıcı (Tesseract.js) and Vision API options
admin_settings.voice_provider: Dropdown with Tarayıcı (Web Speech API), OpenAI Whisper, Google Gemini options
admin_settings.storage_provider: Dropdown with Yerel Sunucu, FTP, AWS S3, Google Drive, OneDrive options
